attributes.action: introduce a window scrappage scheme in the UK to improve the energy efficiency of the existing housing stock
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This scheme would allow householders and landlords to scrap their old poorly insulated windows for a cash incentive of £1,000 to be used against the purchase of new professionally installed energy efficient windows.

The Scheme would allow for an improvement to the existing housing stock to reduce Carbon and CO2 emissions and cut household energy bills.  The Scheme to be open only to companies who professionally install windows with a C Window Energy Rating or above and who responsibility recycle the existing windows that are removed.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to introduce a window scrappage scheme in the UK to improve the energy efficiency of the existing housing stock.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=windowscrappage
